title: Black Beauty
description: Every child loves a story about a horse, and Black Beauty remains one of the finest, most touching ever written. Set in Victorian London, the novel follows the shifting fortunes of a horse as he moves from owner to owner. Narrated by the noble Black Beauty himself, the tale offers an animalâ€™s perspective of the world, and highlights the thoughtless, even cruel treatment animals endured during that period.
author: Anna Sewell
